title: Ivern's height
body: How tall is ivern actually, im really curious

replies.body: I've always envisioned Ivern as being roughly between 8-10 feet tall, personally.
What's that in the international conventional system?

3 meters.

You can thank Google for this.

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pGpukBOk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-19T18:53:40.932+0000)
>
> I've always envisioned Ivern as being roughly between 8-10 feet tall, personally.

Oh. I see, i imagined him being even taller but thats still pretty tall. Thanks for replying

"His limbs grew in length, and became knotty and rough to the touch. He stood helpless as the rest of his body followed suit. Within moments, he was ten feet tall, staring down over a field of his slain comrades. He could not feel his heart pumping, but he was awake and aware."  
                                -Lore
